key.name: enabled
key.summary: If the Zorin Auto Theme daemon is enabled
key.description: Zorin Auto Theme changes the desktop theme throughout the day.

key.name: schedule-automatic
key.description: Calculate the sunrise and sunset times automatically, from the current location.

key.name: schedule-from
key.description: When “schedule-automatic” is disabled, use this start time in hours from midnight.

key.name: schedule-to

key.name: last-coordinates
key.description: When location services are available this represents the last detected location. The default value is an invalid value to ensure it is always updated at startup.

key.name: day-theme
key.description: The desktop theme to use during daytime.

key.name: night-theme
key.description: The desktop theme to use during nighttime.
